examples: a vacuum pump (= one that creates a vacuum)
una bomba de vacío (= una que crea un vacío)
vacuum-packed foods (= in a package from which most of the air has been removed)
alimentos envasados ​​al vacío (= en un paquete del que se ha eliminado la mayor parte del aire)
His resignation has created a vacuum which cannot easily be filled.
Su renuncia ha creado un vacío que no se puede llenar fácilmente.
The writer criticized the moral vacuum in society.
El escritor criticó el vacío moral de la sociedad.
